channel.title: CVE Feed for pickplugins -- Post Grid and Gutenberg Blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pickplugins -- Post Grid and Gutenberg Blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-47340|2024-10-07T17:50:27.625Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid%20and%20gutenberg%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Post Grid and Gutenberg Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Post Grid and Gutenberg Blocks: from n/a through 2.2.89.

item.title: CVE-2024-8253|2024-09-11T18:56:30.780Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid%20and%20gutenberg%20blocks
item.description: The Post Grid and Gutenberg Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions 2.2.87 to 2.2.90. This is due to the plugin not properly restricting what user meta values can be updated and ensuring a form is active. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to update their user meta to become an administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-8253|2024-09-11T03:31:07.619Z -- pickplugins -- post%20grid%20and%20gutenberg%20blocks
item.description: The Post Grid and Gutenberg Blocks plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions 2.2.87 to 2.2.90. This is due to the plugin not properly restricting what user meta values can be updated and ensuring a form is active. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to update their user meta to become an administrator.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PickPlugins Post Grid and Gutenberg Blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Post Grid and Gutenberg Blocks: from n/a through 2.2.89.
